meanings.definition: A representation or embodiment of a deity in Hinduism.
meanings.sent1: The murti of Lord Ganesha was beautifully crafted.
meanings.sent2: During the ceremony, the priest placed the murti on the altar.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous child thought the murti of the god could talk.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness was like a murti of compassion in human form.
meanings.sent5: The intricate details of the murti made it seem almost alive.

meanings.definition: A physical form or statue used for worship in Hinduism.
meanings.sent1: Every morning, the devotees adorned the murti with fresh flowers.
meanings.sent2: The murti of the goddess was placed in the center of the temple.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous child tried to climb the murti during the ceremony.
meanings.sent4: His dedication to his craft was a murti of hard work and perseverance.
meanings.sent5: The murti stood tall, radiating a sense of peace and serenity.
